item.title: As Free As a Bird
item.description: Wow its been a long time since I wrote anything! For those of you visiting here may be pleased to know that I’m finally getting round to writing again, but before a post with any real content I just wanted to mention a few things. I’m no longer on Twitter, Ive not just disabled my account Its actually deleted now, Ive waited the 30 days for it to expire so it should finally be gone now.
